title: Release Viability Gap Funding to Vizhinjam port as grant, not loan, Kerala Chief Minister requests Centre
selftext: It’s disappointing how the central government treats states differently based on politics. The Vizhinjam Port project is vital for the economy and could help save foreign currency reserves by boosting trade. Yet, support seems more about political views than national interest.
comments: Pulling shit like that and get surprised when hostility occurs about staying together
Funnily enough the example Kerala is giving of another port is in Tamil Nadu, where Modi govt. gave grant. Seems like they have more of working relationship with DMK.
